id.description: Unique identifier for the project membership.

kind.description: The type of the project membership.

last_viewed_at.description: The date and time when the project membership was last viewed.

created_at.description: The date and time when the project membership was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the project membership was last updated.

project_id.description: Unique identifier for the project associated with the membership.

favorite.description: Indicates if the project membership is marked as favorite.

project_color.description: The color associated with the project.

role.description: The role of the person within the project.

wants_comment_notification_emails.description: Indicates if the person wants to receive comment notification emails.

will_receive_mention_notifications_or_em.description: Indicates if the person will receive mention notifications or emails.

person.description: Information about the person associated with the project membership.
